game.name: Nightingale Downs
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You play a deer, tasked by your clan leader with a most urgent mission: Find and sabotage the plans of a local human settlement, intent on destroying your homeland. Your journey will be long, through dangerous jungles and facing many natural predators. Will you save your home?
